mema anthargathaya mema adiyaredi nokarannenam wyapruthiyata kala wakawanu saha wiyadam ekathu karamin deshiyakarana adiyaredi eya sthapitha kala yuthu we.simanthi awastha wala di jathyantharikaranaya nowuye nam nipayum pradeshiyakaranaya nowanu atha.
ganemulle sanjiwa kolambaa pathalaye maha kerumkarayan lesa handunwana blumandal sankhage saha aami sampathge samipathama hithamithuraku wiya.
mama hithanne me podi kollo kello tika mata hithaganna bari tharam aadarayak mata dila ee asse hamadatama mathaka hitina sihiwatana kihipayakmath mata dunna.
janadhipathi thuma me sampurna wistharaya dannawada smith mahathma.
mema roga lakshana mathu wu wahama rohalak wetha rogiya gena eemata haki nam ohuge rudhira nalaye hira wi thibena rudhira katiya diya kara harimata awashya aushadhaya laba diya hakiya.
hitlarta eda siti prbala hithawathek nam, ohuge nasi wadaye awatharaya jarmaniya thula pawathi sahajiwanayata kana kok handaladdi, jathyinthara prathajawa dakwu udasina sthawarayayi.

sahanta wishadaya wani rogi thaththwayak thibunawathda kiyala mata welawakata hithenawa.mokada mit pera thun wathawak eya siyadiwi nasaganna uthsaha karala thiyanawa.kathawe hondama hariya thamayi marenna tika welawakata kalin eya kalu jakat andala munata kalu munu dagena eka eka widihata pinthura dala bukiye.eya siyadiwi nasaganna bawath kiyala.bukiye ee welawe hitapu kenek ekka chat karala.eya ee de karanna epa kiyala sahanta kiyala thiyanawa.sahanta thibune bukiyath ekka sambandha prashnayakda kiyanna mama danne na.namuth eya karapu moda wade gana duk wenawa arenna dan wena karanna dekuth na...kese namuth watina tharuna jiwithayak nathiwuna..

apa jiwathwana yugaye pradhanama darshanikaya alen badiyu bawa slawoyi jijak wisin 2008 wasare awasanayedi piliganu labiya.lakeniyanu nyaye samakalina goliya balakendraya wanne slawoyi jijak wana athara, ohuge wadath pathirunu anugamikayan parasaya ayathwanne sinama wicharaya alala ohu karana madihathwimataya.

wachanayen athi uthum aadaraya, parisamapthiyen kiyathoth kimata deyak nomathi,ragaye dewendaya arak gath aadaraya, rathriya purawata nidi warjithawa gatha kalada, arthawath kirimata nohaki aadaraya, mudalata niyama nowana sith pith athi minisungema nirmanayak lesa adahana, witeka kan kendiriyen gaman yana, thawath witeka aawegayen sarisarana, sundarathwaya nam wu mayawaka mulabijaya lesa thawath wapirimata aththe,anga mula nodath aadarayama pamanaki.....
